articles.title: Virginia Norwood passes away: Who was the ‘mother’ of satellite imaging systems - The Indian Express
articles.description: Norwood was an aerospace pioneer who invented the scanner that has been used to map and study the earth from space for more than 50 years. One of a small group of women in a male-dominated industry, she stood out for her acumen.
articles.content: Virginia Norwood, an aerospace pioneer who invented the scanner that has been used to map and study the earth from space for more than 50 years, has died at her home in Topanga, California. She was 9… [+8384 chars]
